name: Defender (itch) (Tank King)
description:
Get the classic retro experience, now featuring a Global Leaderboard for top scores, all from the convenience of your home!

Destroy all alien invaders, while protecting astronauts on the landscape from abduction!

Features:

  • 6 Unique Enemies each with a different attack ability
  • Retro Sounds played similar to the single channel system used by arcade games
  • An Online Leaderboard that is globally accessible
  • Scanner which renders a larger view of the planet
  • Parallax scrolling world

The special attraction of this game is the Online Leaderboard to which anyone can submit their score, while needing no sign up for the same.
Try it out by downloading the game and playing it!

Made with python and pygame
